```{r setup}
library(grassland)
theme_set(ggthemes::theme_few())
```

Load community composition data (experimental and observational).
```{r}
dat_community <- read_community(version = "final")
dat_community
```

```{r}
cfp_sf <- read_cfp()
grass_ras <- read_grasscover()
```

```{r}
dat_occ <- read_biogeography()
dat_occ
dat_clim <- read_climate()
dat_clim
```

Calculate species niche and plot
```{r}
dat_trait <- read_individual_trait()
dat_niche <- calc_species_niche(dat_trait, add_dummy = T)

gg_individual_trait_species_niche_cool <- plot_individual_trait_species_niche_ind_sp(dat_occ, dat_trait, cfp_sf, sp = "Danthonia californica")
gg_individual_trait_species_niche_warm <- plot_individual_trait_species_niche_ind_sp(dat_occ, dat_trait, cfp_sf, sp = "Stipa pulchra")
gg_individual_trait_species_niche_cool
gg_individual_trait_species_niche_warm

gg_species_niche <- plot_species_niche(dat_niche,
  cool_species = "Danthonia californica",
  warm_species = "Stipa pulchra"
)
gg_species_niche
```

Calculate CTI CPI in observations and experiments and plot

```{r}
dat_index <- calc_community_index(dat_niche = dat_niche, dat_community = dat_community)
obs_comm_gg <- plot_community_index(option = "obs", dat_index = dat_index, cfp_sf, grass_ras)
obs_comm_gg
exp_comm_gg <- plot_community_index(option = "exp", dat_index = dat_index)
exp_comm_gg
```

Synthesize coupled CTI CPI change
```{r}
dat_shift <- calc_community_shift(dat_index = dat_index)
gg_community_shift <- plot_community_shift(dat_shift, dat_niche)
gg_community_shift$obs
gg_community_shift$exp
gg_community_shift$compare
```

Analysis of species contributing to CTI CPI change
```{r}
gg_species_gainloss <- plot_species_gainloss(dat_niche = dat_niche)
gg_species_gainloss$obs$circle_detail
gg_species_gainloss$exp$circle_detail
```
